item.title: 500ml 5 bottles x 100ml Purell Advanced Hygiene Hand Rub Gel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
500ml 5 bottles x 100ml Purell Advanced Hygiene Hand Rub Gel
Purell 5 x 100ml Anti Bacterial Alcohol Hand Gel Sanitizer. Condition is New. Bottles do not include labels as per pic. Will be dispensed into 100ml travel bottles from the Unopened Purell Box in the picture.
item.content:encoded:
500ml 5 bottles x 100ml Purell Advanced Hygiene Hand Rub Gel
Purell 5 x 100ml Anti Bacterial Alcohol Hand Gel Sanitizer. Condition is New. Bottles do not include labels as per pic. Will be dispensed into 100ml travel bottles from the Unopened Purell Box in the picture.

item.title: Purell Alcohol Based Hand Rub Gel Sanitiser Pump Bottle 300ml
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Purell Alcohol Based Hand Rub Gel Sanitiser Pump Bottle 300ml Purell Advanced formula gel in a convenient 300ml pump bottle
No water or towels needed.
Specially formulated with moisturisers to leave hands feeling soft and refreshed.
Recommended for use on hands that are lightly soiled and in conjunction with a hand hygiene regimen.
Yeasticidal according to EN 1275. Conforms to EN 1500, EN 1040, and EN 12054. Contains ethanol produced from 100% plant sources
Conditions skin with a natural moisturiser
Readily biodegradable
(OECD 301D)3
Fragrance free and dye free
